chats.no_money: Not enough tokens. Top up ADM balance
chats.retry_message: Not sent: weak connection. Click to retry
chats.title: Chats

transaction_statuses.invalid: Inconsistent information. Check transaction in token's blockchain carefully
transaction_statuses.rejected: Transaction is cancelled or not accepted

chats.welcome_message:
ADAMANT is a true Blockchain messenger, independent from governments, corporations and even developers. It is possible due to a decentralized network infrastructure, fully open source and run by users. That's why every action, including sending message or saving contact name, has its network fee of 0.001 ADM.

Blockchain offers superior security and privacy, not available for typical P2P and centralized messengers. Also, Blockchain provides new possibilities. You can store and transfer cryptos In-Chat with full control of your private keys, use ADAMANT as 2FA, anonymously exchange cryptocurrencies, make bets on Bitcoin rate and more.

In ADAMANT, nobody can control, block, deactivate, restrict or censor accounts. Users take full responsibility for content, messages, media, and goals and intentions of using the Messenger.

ADAMANT is anonymous, your IP is hidden from partners, and Tor version is available for paranoids. But remember, your security and anonymity is up to you. Do not follow links you receive, otherwise your IP can be compromised. Set a password on your device. Learn more about security and anonymity at https://adamant.im/staysecured/.

Make sure you've saved the passPhrase for this account — logout and login again. Write your passPhrase on a sheet of paper as well. Only *you are responsible for passPhrase safety*. It cannot be recovered. And if other person will get it, your tokens will be stolen and correspondence read. Treat this question with outmost importance, as if tokens in your wallet will cost a billion dollars some time.

To start messaging now, *get free welcome tokens* on Account tab. Then create new chat and put your friend's ADM address. It is recommended to share your ADM address personally, not using other messengers.

Search Internet for ADAMANT bots addresses. They can exchange cryptos, accept bets on crypto rates, and make wishes come true.

login.create_address_label: Or create a new anonymous address:
login.invalid_qr_code: QR code does not contain passphrase or unable to recognise
login.login_by_qr_code_tooltip: Login with passphrase in QR code file
login.new_passphrase_label: Save the passphrase for new wallet and messenger account. No login, only the passphrase. If you lose it, there is no way to recover
login.save_button_tooltip: Save passphrase in a text file. Store it in secure place!
login.save_qr_code_tooltip: Save your passphrase as an QR code image. Store it in secure place!
login.scan_qr_code_button_tooltip: Scan QR code with passphrase via device camera
login.subheader: A top-notch anonymous messenger encrypted with a blockchain

login_via_password.article_hint: Read information about user password in
login_via_password.remove_password_hint: Or remove password for login via passphrase

nodes.fastest_tooltip: When turned on, most of requests will be processed with a single node. To keep anonymity on high level, we do not recommend turning on this option
nodes.nodeLabelDescription: Support decentralization and enhance privacy level—run your own ADAMANT node and web application for messaging. Node can be run following instructions. To add your nodes in the list for connection, you need to deploy web application on separate domain. This limitation refers to Content Security Policy (CSP). In iOS and Android applications there are no such limitations.

tabMessage.few: no new messages | 1 new message | {n} new messages | {n} new messages

options.enable_bar: Allow notifications by browser tab title
options.enable_bar_tooltip: Shows new message counter in the tab title. Works on desktop browsers
options.enable_sound_tooltip: Play a sound notification when new message received. Some devices does not support it (a mobile browser stay silent if not active)
options.exit_on_close_tooltip: For your wallet security we recommend you keep this checkbox turned on. If you turn it off, your passphrase will be saved in browser, and next time you open the wallet it will be decrypted without a need to enter passphrase. This option only acceptable in a case when nobody else can access your device
options.idb_not_supported: Your browser does not support IndexedDB or in Private Browsing mode
options.push_denied: PUSH notifications has been denied in browser settings
options.push_not_supported: PUSH notifications not supported by this browser
options.send_on_enter_tooltip: Send messages by Enter key, new line by combination Shift+Enter. By default, combination Ctrl+Enter or Cmd+Enter (Mac) is used to send messages

scan.connect_camera: Connect the camera and try again
scan.hold_your_device: Hold your device steady for 2-3 seconds towards the QR code you want to scan

login.modal_header: Scan QR code with a passphrase

new-chat.modal_header: Scan QR code with ADAMANT wallet address

scan.something_wrong: Unexpected error. Check the adm console application

transaction.me_and_addresses: no address | Me and {n} more address | Me and {n} more addresses

transfer.error_chat_fee: To send {crypto} in the chat, you also need 0.001 ADM
transfer.error_erc20_fee: You also need {fee} to pay the transfer fee
transfer.error_not_enough_eth_fee: Not enough tokens for ETH fee
transfer.error_same_recipient: Recipient address can not be same as sender address
transfer.no_address_text: This user does not have a public {crypto} wallet yet. To retrieve it, he should log in to the messenger with more than 0.001 ADM at balance

votes.summary_info: Voting cost: 50 ADM. Read about voting and forging.
